<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Volatile RMWs perform a load and a store, we cannot replace this by just a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// load or just a store. We chose not to canonicalize out of general paranoia</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// operation code and constant.  This makes it easier for the rest of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
